response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and unique features, it is worth $1,500,000 to you. After careful consideration, I am extending an offer to sell this product to you for $1,200,000. This price reflects a strategic balance between maximizing my earnings and providing you with an attractive deal.

Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. I am confident that this product will meet and exceed your expectations, offering you unparalleled benefits and value.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
